fields.headline: Pick of the week: Classical
fields.bodyText: Opera Shorts Carlton Hotel, Edinburgh Saturday 2 to Friday 7 Six new operas from six up-and-coming teams of composers and librettists. The Rise And Fall Of The City Of Mahagonny Usher Hall, Edinburgh Friday 7 A concert performance of Brecht and Weill's opera, conducted by HK Gruber, opens the Edinburgh International Festival.
